vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φόρον, τό,
= Latin forum, Ἀππίου φ. [NT+6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: forum, used only as a compound Proper name "Forum of Appius," a market town south of Rome
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ forum, used only as a compound Proper name "Forum of Appius," a market town south of Rome
a forum, marketplace;, Φόρον Ἀππιου, Forum Appii, the name of a small town on the Appian way, according to Antoninus, forty-three Roman miles from Rome, or about forty English miles, Acts 28:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 市
1a) 與675連用,和合本作 "亞比烏市", 義大利的一個城鎮, 在離羅馬城 43 羅馬哩(70 公里)的Appian大路上
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 市
1a) 与675连用,和合本作 "亚比乌市", 义大利的一个城镇, 在离罗马城 43 罗马哩(70 公里)的Appian大路上
